name: Ghost Caravan
description:
A game for DMSPILJAM 2020, hap-hazardly thrown together by 3 unapproved engineers in a dangerously small window of time. THE GAME

As the conductor of this mysterious carriage, you must keep the train running at all costs! Survive for as long as possible to prolong your inevitable death!

-Fuel The Burner!

-Cool Your Wheels!

-Prepare For Unwanted Visitors!

-Fend Off Unwanted Visitors!

GHOST CARAVAN supports both SOLO and COOP play. Do you play on your own to push for the best highscore, or do you snatch a friend to enjoy the game as a cooperative, fun experience in which you coordinate each others move to keep the train running together. 

Please do consider giving both gamemodes a try, they're two very different experiences :)
